title: Why you should talk to strangers
description: "When you talk to strangers, you're making beautiful interruptions into the expected narrative of your daily life -- and theirs," says Kio Stark. In this delightful talk, Stark explores the overlooked benefits of pushing past our default discomfort when it comes to strangers and embracing those fleeting but profoundly beautiful moments of genuine connection.
author: Kio Stark
keywords: TED, talks, anthropology, communication, community, personality, humanity, society, TED Books, friendship
